remarks: Reformulation of the lower dimension axiom for dimension 2.  There exist three non colinear points.  Theorem 6.24 of [Schwabhauser] p. 46.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-May-2019.)
statement:
tglineintmo.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tglineintmo.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tglineintmo.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
tglineintmo.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
tglowdim2l.1 $e |- ( ph -> G TarskiGDim>= 2 ) $.
tglowdim2l $p |- ( ph -> E. a e. P E. b e. P E. c e. P -. ( c e. ( a L b ) \/ a = b ) ) $.
$d G a b c $.
$d I a b c $.
$d P a b c $.
$d a b c ph $.
